Headline: James Griffiths
Article_Body: James Griffiths is a Senior Producer for CNN International. He joined CNN in 2015, and writes features and breaking news from across Asia, as well as in-depth analysis of Asian politics and human rights. James is the author of "The Great Firewall of China: How to build and control an alternative version of the internet."  Originally from the UK, James has reported on-the-ground from China, South Korea, Malaysia, Sri Lanka, Australia and Hong Kong. Prior to joining CNN, he worked for a variety of publications including the South China Morning Post, The Atlantic, The Daily Beast and GlobalPost.  Follow: @jgriffiths
